CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests how SourceFormatter handles CSS sources

Formatted:
@media screen {
    html {
        color: green;
        foo-property: bar-value
    }
}
}

body {
    background-color: black;
}

Location mapping with formatted source:
Mapped locations:
0:15 -> 0:14 -> 0:15
0:22 -> 1:9 -> 0:22
0:65 -> 8:5 -> 0:65
Live locations (updated: 3):
0:14
1:9
8:5
Location mapping without formatted source:
Mapped locations:
0:15 -> 0:15 -> 0:15
0:22 -> 0:22 -> 0:22
0:65 -> 0:65 -> 0:65
Live locations (updated: 6):
0:15
0:22
0:65
